name: Bifrost Orbital
long_description:
At Bifrost Orbital, we're building the future of satellite connectivity.

Our mission is to eliminate communication blackouts and dead spots in orbit by providing an always-on, continuous connectivity service for satellites and other spacecraft in low Earth orbit. We're building an optical relay network of satellites to provide 24/7 uplink and downlink support to other satellites in orbit, with increased uptime and higher data rates for TT&C and more.
